Text: data science is an umbrella of several techniques that are used for extracting the information and the insights of data.

Data Science is a pool of data operations that also involves Data Mining. A Data Scientist is required to perform multiple operations like analysis of data, development of predictive models, discovering hidden patterns
Data Science is a broader field using various algorithms and processes to extract meaningful insights out of the unstructured and structured data.
Data Science is Multidisciplinary. It is the Umbrella and Data Mining is one of its Components
Data Science is a blend of various tools, algorithms, and machine learning principles with the goal to discover hidden patterns from the raw data
Data science is a "concept to unify statistics, data analysis, machine learning and their related methods" in order to "understand and analyze actual phenomena" with data.
Data science is becoming a highly sought-after way to mine the data to uncover intelligence that will power data-driven businesses today
Data Science is the process of applying scientific computations to extract meaningful insights from the billion and trillion bytes of data by using appropriate statistical methods
Data Science is collecting and refining information from many sources, analyzing and presenting the information in useful ways
Data science is a field that helps the user understand events or gain useful information simply by going through data and analyzing it
Data science is multidisciplinary which consists of data visualizations, social sciences, statistics, data mining, natural language processing
